message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on using deep learning language models (RNNs) to generate fake online reviews, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the use of statistical detectors to identify fake reviews, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The paper also mentions the use of automated defenses against these attacks, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of online service providers to impose constraints on these attacks, which falls under the category of computer systems organization (cs.CY) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
